verses.verse: Observe<WH8104> the month<WH2320> of Abib<WH24>, and keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: for in the month<WH2320> of Abib<WH24> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought thee forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714> by night<WH3915>.

Thou shalt therefore sacrifice<WH2076> the passover<WH6453> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, of the flock<WH6629> and the herd<WH1241>, in the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there.

Thou shalt eat<WH398> no leavened bread<WH2557> with it; seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shalt thou eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682> therewith, even the bread<WH3899> of affliction<WH6040>; for thou camest forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> in haste<WH2649>: that thou mayest remember<WH2142> the day<WH3117> when thou camest forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> all the days<WH3117> of thy life<WH2416>.

And there shall be no leavened bread<WH7603> seen<WH7200> with thee in all thy coast<WH1366> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>; neither shall there any thing of the flesh<WH1320>, which thou sacrificedst<WH2076> the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> at even<WH6153>, remain<WH3885> all night until the morning<WH1242>.
Thou mayest<WH3201> not sacrifice<WH2076> the passover<WH6453> within any<WH259> of thy gates<WH8179>, which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee:

But at the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> in, there thou shalt sacrifice<WH2076> the passover<WH6453> at even<WH6153>, at the going down<WH935> of the sun<WH8121>, at the season<WH4150> that thou camest forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>.

And thou shalt roast<WH1310> and eat<WH398> it in the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977>: and thou shalt turn<WH6437> in the morning<WH1242>, and go<WH1980> unto thy tents<WH168>.

Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> thou shalt eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682>: and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> shall be a solemn assembly<WH6116> to the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: thou shalt do<WH6213> no work<WH4399> therein.

¶ Seven<WH7651> weeks<WH7620> shalt thou number<WH5608> unto thee: begin<WH2490> to number<WH5608> the seven<WH7651> weeks<WH7620> from such time as thou beginnest<WH2490> to put the sickle<WH2770> to the corn<WH7054>.

And thou shalt keep<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of weeks<WH7620> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with a tribute<WH4530> of a freewill offering<WH5071> of thine hand<WH3027>, which thou shalt give<WH5414> unto the LORD thy God, according as the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath blessed<WH1288> thee:

And thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, thou, and thy son<WH1121>, and thy daughter<WH1323>, and thy manservant<WH5650>, and thy maidservant<WH519>, and the Levite<WH3881> that is within thy gates<WH8179>, and the stranger<WH1616>, and the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, that are among<WH7130> you, in the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there.
And thou shalt remember<WH2142> that thou wast a bondman<WH5650> in Egypt<WH4714>: and thou shalt observe<WH8104> and do<WH6213> these statutes<WH2706>.
¶ Thou shalt observe<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>, after that thou hast gathered<WH622> in thy corn<WH1637> and thy wine<WH3342>:

And thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> in thy feast<WH2282>, thou, and thy son<WH1121>, and thy daughter<WH1323>, and thy manservant<WH5650>, and thy maidservant<WH519>, and the Levite<WH3881>, the stranger<WH1616>, and the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, that are within thy gates<WH8179>.

Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shalt thou keep a solemn feast<WH2287> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which the LORD<WH3068> shall choose<WH977>: because the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bless<WH1288> thee in all thine increase<WH8393>, and in all the works<WH4639> of thine hands<WH3027>, therefore thou shalt surely rejoice<WH8056>.

¶ Three<WH7969> times<WH6471> in a year<WH8141> shall all thy males<WH2138> appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which he shall choose<WH977>; in the feast<WH2282> of unleavened bread<WH4682>, and in the feast<WH2282> of weeks<WH7620>, and in the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521>: and they shall not appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> empty<WH7387>:
Every man<WH376> shall give as he is able<WH4979><WH3027>, according to the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> which he hath given<WH5414> thee.

¶ Judges<WH8199> and officers<WH7860> shalt thou make<WH5414> thee in all thy gates<WH8179>, which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, throughout thy tribes<WH7626>: and they shall judge<WH8199> the people<WH5971> with just<WH6664> judgment<WH4941>.

Thou shalt not wrest<WH5186> judgment<WH4941>; thou shalt not respect<WH5234> persons<WH6440>, neither take<WH3947> a gift<WH7810>: for a gift<WH7810> doth blind<WH5786> the eyes<WH5869> of the wise<WH2450>, and pervert<WH5557> the words<WH1697> of the righteous<WH6662>.
That which is altogether<WH6664> just<WH6664> shalt thou follow<WH7291>, that thou mayest live<WH2421>, and inherit<WH3423> the land<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee.
¶ Thou shalt not plant<WH5193> thee a grove<WH842> of any trees<WH6086> near unto<WH681> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, which thou shalt make<WH6213> thee.
Neither shalt thou set thee up<WH6965> any image<WH4676>; which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hateth<WH8130>.
